sentence: booked by our corporate travel team due to regular hotel not accepting reservations for a last minute trip were not sure what we were getting for the price
I have to say I was disappointed when I realized it was a Holiday Inn
Here is a list of items that should be unacceptable at any Holiday Inn in my opinion
Holiday Inn should be embarrassed to have this property on their roster
Others Not as homely as holiday inn express in Duncan
Negatives Despite booking for a family of five they could only give us a single king sized bed and a sleeper sofa without sheets and bedding
Not a hotel I would choose to vacation at but it was great for one night

it would cycle from hot to cold a lot and i had to make too may trips to the wall unit controlpart of hotel is under construction so there was no fitness center helped me avoid coming up with an excuse not to exercise
Had to spend the night near Houston airport twice last week and picked the Holiday Inn on JFK
The Holiday Inn Airport Hotel in Houston is ok but I have asked my travel agent to take them off their list
I would stay at a Holiday Inn Express anytime
The ONLY good thing about that trip was the desk clerk SHEILA
The staff was very forgiving of our loud and rowdy group
I will never stay at another holiday inn nor will I ever book one for any of my employees as their money and safety is paramount
the hotel has enough everything for out short trip
All of the staff was excellent we were there 2 months and they treated us like family
First this Holiday Inn is huge it has many room
It was my first time staying in USA and one of the nicest people I ’ve met is on the Holiday Inn where I stayed after flight
All in all the worst Holiday Inn I have ever stayed in
I stay at Holiday Inns all the time and not sure how this property meets the IHG standard
Thank you Holiday Inn and particularly the very pleasant mini bus driver who collected us from the airport
Now I am a platinum IHG member and have stayed at many many Holiday Inns throughout the world this has to be the worst condition of any I have stayed at before
This Holiday inn is located by the International Airport George Bush Intl
